tossup_question: 18) CHEMISTRY  According to the second law of thermodynamics, what effect does a spontaneous reaction have on the entropy of the universe?
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Increases the Entropy of the universe
bonus_question: 18) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following types of decay does uranium-238 experience in order to yield thorium-234?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Alpha
X) Beta
Y) Double beta 
Z) Gamma
